di.uniba.map.b.adventure.impl.AePlayWave Class Reference di.uniba.map.b.adventure.impl.AePlayWave
Inherits Thread. Collaboration diagram for di.uniba.map.b.adventure.impl.AePlayWave:
Detailed Description
This class is designed to play sound files in a separate thread. It supports basic operations such as play, stop, and handling of audio pan (left, right, normal).
